verses.verse: (A Psalm of David, for a memorial.) O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> me not in Thy <S%H7110>wrath;<s%> And <S%H3256>chasten<s%> me not in Thy <S%H2534>burning<s%> <S%H2534>anger.<s%>
For Thine <S%H2671>arrows<s%> have <S%H5181>sunk<s%> <S%H5181>deep<s%> into me, And Thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> has <S%H5181>pressed<s%> <S%H5181>down<s%> on me.

<S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4974>soundness<s%> in my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of Thine <S%H2195>indignation;<s%> <S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7965>health<s%> in my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of my <S%H9128>sin.<s%>

For my <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> are <S%H5674>gone<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> my <S%H7218>head;<s%> As a <S%H3515>heavy<s%> <S%H4853>burden<s%> they <S%H3513>weigh<s%> <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H3515>much<s%> for me.
My <S%H2250>wounds<s%> <S%H887>grow<s%> <S%H887>foul<s%> [and] <S%H4743>fester.<s%> <S%H4480>Because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of my <S%H200>folly,<s%>
I am <S%H9389>bent<s%> over and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H7817>bowed<s%> <S%H7817>down;<s%> I <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6937>mourning<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long.
For my <S%H3689>loins<s%> are <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7033>burning;<s%> And <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4974>soundness<s%> in my <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>
I am <S%H6313>benumbed<s%> and <S%H3966>badly<s%> <S%H1794>crushed;<s%> I <S%H7580>groan<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of the <S%H5100>agitation<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H8378>desire<s%> is <S%H5048>before<s%> Thee; And my <S%H585>sighing<s%> is not <S%H5641>hidden<s%> from Thee.
My <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5503>throbs,<s%> my <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H5800>fails<s%> me; And the <S%H216>light<s%> of my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> that has <S%H369>gone<s%> from me.

My <S%H157>loved<s%> ones and my <S%H7453>friends<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H4480>aloof<s%> <S%H5048><s%> from my <S%H5061>plague;<s%> And my <S%H7138>kinsmen<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H7350>afar<s%> off.

Those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%> <S%H5367>lay<s%> <S%H5367>snares<s%> [for me]; And those who <S%H1875>seek<s%> to <S%H9567>injure<s%> me have <S%H1696>threatened<s%> <S%H1942>destruction,<s%> And they <S%H1897>devise<s%> <S%H4820>treachery<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long.
But I, like a <S%H2795>deaf<s%> <S%H2795>man,<s%> do not <S%H8085>hear;<s%> And I am like a <S%H483>dumb<s%> <S%H483>man<s%> who does not <S%H6605>open<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
Yes, I am like a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> does not <S%H8085>hear,<s%> And in whose <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H9640>arguments.<s%>
For I <S%H3176>hope<s%> in Thee, O <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> Thou wilt <S%H6030>answer,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%>
For I <S%H559>said,<s%> "May they not <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> over me, [Who,] when my <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H4131>slips,<s%> would <S%H1431>magnify<s%> themselves <S%H5921>against<s%> me."
For I am <S%H3559>ready<s%> to <S%H6761>fall,<s%> And my <S%H4341>sorrow<s%> is <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> me.
For I <S%H5046>confess<s%> my <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> I am <S%H1672>full<s%> of <S%H1672>anxiety<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of my <S%H9128>sin.<s%>
But my <S%H340>enemies<s%> are <S%H2416>vigorous<s%> [and] <S%H6105>strong;<s%> And <S%H7231>many<s%> are those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H8267>wrongfully.<s%>
And those who <S%H9608>repay<s%> <S%H9567>evil<s%> for <S%H9186>good,<s%> They <S%H7853>oppose<s%> me, <S%H8478>because<s%> I <S%H7291>follow<s%> <S%H9185>what<s%> is <S%H9185>good.<s%>
Do not <S%H5800>forsake<s%> me, O <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> O my <S%H430>God,<s%> do not be <S%H7368>far<s%> from me!
<S%H2363>Make<s%> <S%H2363>haste<s%> to <S%H5833>help<s%> me, O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> my <S%H8668>salvation!<s%>
